title: 2023 Around Durg
description: Around Durg, White Browed Fantail with chick was unique experience

title: 2023 Tadoba
description: Tadoba means tiger, we did sighted lots of birds as well

title: 2023 Around Pune
description: Sinhagad Valley, Mangoan for the Great Horn Bill and hide for some small birds

title: 2023 Around Bhigwan
description: A birders paradise around Bhigwan from water birds to dry grass raptors & owl

title: 2022 Durg Birds
description: The highlight was Osprey and Purple Heron along with other birds around Durg and Bhilai

title: 2022 Mangaljodi Birds (2/2)
description: This part of the FIP (Federation of Indian Photography)'s 3 days workshop. We had 2 rides each day for 3 days. It was really nice to meet people from India. After the first 3 days already was quite familiar with birds, boats, guides and areas of Mangaljodi. I got my best photo in the last day on th 11th boat ride.

title: 2022 Mangaljodi Birds (1/2)
description: This part of the FIP (Federation of Indian Photography)'s 3 days workshop. We had 2 rides each day for 3 days. It was really nice to meet people from India. For the first three days I had Mr. Ramakanth from Bangalore, in fact I travelled with him and he was my room-mate for the first 3 days. We stayed at Godwit Eco Resort.

title: 2021 October Udaipur
description: The key attraction was trip was Jawai (Bera) known as the Leopard country. It is not a forest that is managed by Government. After Jawai visited Ranakpur Jain Temple & Kumbhalgarh Wildlife Sanctuary. They are part of the same mountain range. The icing of this trip was seeing Leucistic Common Kingfisher at Udaipur.

title: 2021 March Bandipur
description: This trip was part of Nikon Workshop. It was one night 2 safaris in the month of March, when jungle was quite dry. The hope was to spot some tigers, we became very lucky to spot a leopard cub in close proximity.

title: 2021 March Karnataka
description: This was a short trip to Coorg, on the way visited Kokkarebellur from Kannada translates to 'hamlet of the storks' in English. This 300-year-old village is situated in Maddur taluk of Mandya district.

title: 2021 Feb Calcutta
description: A quick trip to Calcutta and i carried my camera gear and visited Rabindra Sarobar which is in the middle of south Calcutta a beautiful recreational area with man made lake. Also happy to visit Chintamoni Kar Bird Sanctuary (CKBS) south of Calcutta

title: 2020 Dec Bhilai (C.G.)
description: 2Â½ months at in-laws' place in the midst of 1st year of COVID pandemic, meet wonderful birders who took me under their wings and really had a great time. I saw so many lifers starting with BlueThroat to others.
